WorkItem.Description:
When i create a word document i want every chapter numberd automaticly (i dont mean the table of contents).
In the example file TitleTOC.docx on page 2 i want to see  1. I am Title 1
Is this possible?
WorkItem.Summary: Add titles but can't automatic number the titles

Comments.Message: I have meetting this problem . who could help us resolve this issue.

I think this is possible. In XML its a combined ListItem and Title source.

It will be implemented in the next release I think.

Best regards,
Matthias

Hi,
